summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3127 for the improvement of Tenth Avenue Northeast, Eleventh Avenue Northeast and Twelfth Avenue Northeast, each from Northlake Avenue to Brintnall Place, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38200, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
